Text.Page:
The local fauna have gone berserk and threaten ongoing operations. Hunt down and destroy {@LinkCreature:29#1011#thick tusked shoats}, {@LinkCreature:29#2011#vicious shoats}, {@LinkCreature:29#1021#inky sabertooths}, {@LinkCreature:29#1031#inky sabertooth alphas}, {@LinkCreature:29#2021#leafcutter arachnens}, and {@LinkCreature:29#2031#vinesplicer arachnens}. We've little time, so get on this at once.

Report to Kendara when mission is complete.
Your hard work pays off, <PCNAME>. We can use more soldiers like you.
Apologies, but without proof of death, payments aren't authorized.
